Header: 18 dead, 17 missing as severe floods hit Siberia
Content: 18 dead and 17 were reported missing after severe floods had hit Irkutsk region in Siberia. Drone video footage shot by local resident near the town of Tulun showed heavy destruction in affected area. Irkutsk region governor said emergency service managed to restore communication between Tulun and Irkutsk, and had cleared the water from the road to the city, which was clearly visible on the aerial video. The Emergency Ministry said more than 1,303 people had been treated in hospitals. The flood was caused by freak downpours of rain that caused the river to swell and burst its banks.
